Detailed Description

Implements the standard-deviation weighted Euclidean distance for continuous attributes.

This is an implementation of the DistanceFunction abstract class for continuous attributes. It implements the standard-deviation weighted Euclidean distance. That is, the distance is weighted by four times the standard deviation of the attribute to reduce the effect of outliers.
